Legal_Issue: Whether the Board erred in determining that the applicant had an internal flight alternative (IFA) and state protection
Application_Facts: Applicant claimed refugee status due to persecution as a homosexual in Mexico, alleging police harassment and societal discrimination
Court_Ruling: The decision was reasonable; no grounds exist for the Court to interfere with the Board's determination
Claimant_Status: Asylum seeker claiming persecution based on sexual orientation
Grounds_for_Claim: Persecution due to sexual orientation, police harassment, societal discrimination
Assessment_Factor: Incidents were isolated, not escalating, did not amount to persecution; possibility of relocation within Mexico; access to state protection
Procedural_Issue: Judicial review of Refugee Protection Divisionâ€™s decision
Evidence_Used: Alleged incidents of police harassment and societal discrimination
Application_Basis: Fear of persecution in Mexico due to homosexuality
Evidence_Assessed: Insufficient evidence of persecution or lack of state protection
Governing_Rule: Standard of review for IFA and state protection is reasonableness, requiring evidence showing why returning to another part of the country would not be safe
Evidentiary_Deficiency: Lack of evidence demonstrating that relocation within Mexico would be unsafe or that state protection was unavailable
Harm_Assessment: Alleged harm due to sexual orientation including harassment and discrimination
Cause_Description: Applicant claimed refugee status due to persecution as a homosexual in Mexico, alleging police harassment and societal discrimination
Evidence_Handling: Board assessed evidence and found it insufficient to establish persecution or lack of protection
Evidence_Issues: Evidence did not show systemic persecution or failure of state protection
Evidence_Assessment: Incidents were isolated and not indicative of persecution; state protection available
Decision_Rationale: The Board found no evidence that the applicant could not safely relocate within Mexico or that state protection was ineffective
Evidentiary_Issues: Failure to provide sufficient evidence of ongoing persecution or absence of state protection
